articles.title: Fantasia Barrino to Star in ‘The Color Purple’ Movie Musical - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Singer-songwriter Fantasia Barrino will make her feature film debut in The Color Purple movie musical. Barrino, who grew to fame on the third season of American Idol, is in final negotiations to play Celie, a role that she played on stage on Broadway in 2007 …

articles.title: Malditas settle for joint 3rd in Women's Asia Cup - pna.gov.ph
